passages.text:
You are standing in front of the famous Millenium Falcon. Han Solo is in the cockpit, Chewbacca is in the lower deck, Luke Skywalker is in the Communal Space.

[[Go to meet Han Solo->Cockpit]]
[[Go to meet Chebacca->Lower Deck]]
[[Go to meet Luke Skywalker->Communal Space]]
[[Look around by yourself->Engine Room]]
passages.name: Millenium Falcon

passages.text:
Han Solo greets you in the cockpit of the Millennium Falcon. He asks you if you would like to see him fly the Millennium Falcon.

[[Fly the Milennium Falcon with Han Solo->Space]]
[[Go back to the front of the Falcon->Millenium Falcon]]

links.name: Fly the Milennium Falcon with Han Solo
Go back to the front of the Falcon

passages.name: Cockpit

passages.text:
You meet Chewbacca in the lower decks of the Millennium Falcon, and he offers you a roasted porg.

[[Eat roasted porg with Chewbacca->Lower Deck (After Eating)]]
[[Go back to the front of the Falcon->Millenium Falcon]]

links.name: Go back to the front of the Falcon

passages.name: Lower Deck

passages.text:
You go to the Communal Space of the Millennium Falcon and you find Luke Skywalker playing Dejarik, also known as Holochess, with Lando Calrissian. Luke see's you and asks if you would like to play a game of Dejarik against him.

[[Play Against Luke->Communal Space (Dejarik Postgame)]]
[[Go back to the front of the Falcon->Millenium Falcon]]

links.name: Go back to the front of the Falcon

passages.name: Communal Space

passages.text:
You decide to go looking around the falcon by yourself and get lost. You find yourself to be in the Engine room of the Millennium Falcon.

[[Find your way out->Millenium Falcon]] 
[[Keep on looking around->Laser Turret Room]]
[[Call for help->Engine Room with Chewbacca]]
passages.name: Engine Room

passages.text:
You decided to fly the Millennium Falcon with Han Solo. You had a great time and now you head back to the front of the Falcon.

[[Go back to the front->Millenium Falcon]]
passages.name: Space

passages.text:
You ate the roasted porg with Chewbacca and had a great time with him.

[[Go back to the front->Millenium Falcon]]
passages.name: Lower Deck (After Eating)

passages.text:
You played against Luke Skywalker in Holochess and won! Who would've thought you could beat a Jedi in Holochess.

[[Go back to the front->Millenium Falcon]]
passages.name: Communal Space (Dejarik Postgame)

passages.text:
You decided to keep looking around and found yourself in the Laser Turret Room. 

[[Mess around with the turrets->Cockpit with Angry Han Solo]]
[[Find your way out->Millenium Falcon]]
passages.name: Laser Turret Room

passages.text:
Chewbacca ended up finding you after you called for help and took you back to the front of the Millennium Falcon.

[[Back to the front->Millenium Falcon]]
passages.name: Engine Room with Chewbacca

passages.text:
You messed around with the laser turret and accidently fired it and almost shot someone. Han Solo has found you and kicked you out of the Falcon.

[[Restart Game->Millenium Falcon]]
passages.name: Cockpit with Angry Han Solo
